answers.answer: Try reading other threads on this forum as diet/nutrition plans have been discussed many, many times. Also, learn to use the Search window and clicking on the tabs at page top for basic type 2 diabetes information.
Hi,low carbohydrate diet would likely be best approach.  you can google this.
